com.px100systems.util

Class SpringELCtx

  • java.lang.Object
    • StandardEvaluationContext
      • com.px100systems.util.SpringELCtx

  • public class SpringELCtx
extends StandardEvaluationContext
    Unified Spring EL context with all supplemental static functions
    Author:
    Alex Rogachevsky
